about_the_game:
Come on in out of the cold, and step into your new role as a cozy coffee shop manager! Stay

on top of customer orders, track your finances, and make sure to keep your inventory well-

stocked. Set your own prices to strike a balance between affordability and profit, and try to

attract as many clients as possible. Build your reputation to become the best café in town!

Find the perfect ambiance by filling your coffee shop with decorative items like candles and

plants. Then, take your café to the next level with multiple upgrades, attracting more

customers the more you improve it. You’ll have a bustling social hub in no time!

Oh, and one more thing… Yes, you can pet the cat.

Features:

- Two difficulty modes: Relaxing and Challenging. In Challenging mode, you’ll put your

barista skills to the test by memorizing customer orders as you take them.

- Continually upgrade your café, expanding it with more furniture, buying new equipment,

and adding new food and drink items to the menu.

- Choose your starting character, you can play as male or female.

- Set your own prices, adjusting them as needed to keep a healthy cash flow without losing

clients. If needed, you can even take a loan from the bank.

- Interact with the cat, petting it and feeding it to keep it happy.

- Expand the menu with the multiple food and drink orders available.

- Even more exciting new features coming with the 1.0 version!

  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 480 / AMD HD6850 / Intel HD Graphics 4400 or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: Become a cozy coffee shop owner. Manage inventory, set prices, take payments, pet the cat, expand, and decorate your venue to build the best coffee house. Enjoy the charm of a heartwarming cafe simulator!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
